data.title: Phoolon Jaisi Hai Ye Ladkii
data.meta_description: Phoolon Jaisi Hai Ye Ladkii ;  Singer: Clinton Cerejo, Kalyani Menon ; Movie: Ekk Deewana Tha (2012) ; Music Director: A R Rahman ; Lyricist: Javed Akhtar
data.text:
splendiddeeds112 on Wednesday, February 08, 2012

watched vtv-omane penne jus nw...bad, director chose vtv over ymc when

remaking in hindi... omane has absolutely no awesome dance steps/skirts of

samantha. Also awesome picturisation during malayalam words in ymc simbu

jus acted bad when he says omane penne while driving the car vtv fans..jus

wait n watch ..samantha wil rock your feet off with her next tamil

releases...

Madan kumar on Tuesday, February 07, 2012

This film has less promotion and publicity i dont know whats the reason ?

So come on southindian guyz take your all friends to see this film, a must

watch film by gautham menon and let us repeat the same magic wich was done

earlier in telugu and tamil version

pinky2B4 on Tuesday, March 20, 2012

@bwfan87 thats because shes wearing brown contacts to mask her blue eyes

and dyed her hair black! She also look like she tanned alot. I know this

because I watched Madrasapattinam, a tamil movie where she plays a white

girl.

Madan kumar on Wednesday, February 08, 2012

@Nitinnagar maybe because of gautham menon is busy with upcoming films like

neethane en ponvasantham wich is going to be trilingual film in

tamil,telugu,hindi simultaneously and he has other films with vijay

dwcproject on Tuesday, February 21, 2012
